QAPair.Question: What is (are) Benign positional vertigo - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: You may have seen your health care provider because you have had benign positional vertigo . It is also called benign paroxysmal positional vertigo, or BPPV. BPPV is the most common cause of vertigo and the easiest to treat.
